body:
I tried to render a daylighting analysis mesh using Rhino's default render , I only get the mesh rendered in the material chosen for the layer/mesh. I can't seem to figure out how to show the different colors of the mesh in the rendering. Any help would be much appreciated.



Update: The analysis mesh doesn't render at all. I tried rendering using Maxwell and Rhino's render
topic: How do I render a baked analysis mesh?
